speaker: Nolitusne
content: Whatever you say! Prepare to be challenged by me!
At this point Shungen pulls your shirt, signaling that your teacher will be here soon, and you walk into the classroom without talking to Nolitusne any further.
The opening ceremony went well and you had a great time in your new high school,
learning a lot of new things every day, except that sometimes Nolitusne would challenge you in various ways and enjoy it,
but sometimes you still remembered that.

bgm: 和田俊輔 (わだしゅんすけ)-ファルツォーネの優雅なる風景.mp3

chooseItem.text: What is Shungen doing these days? Go see him!
Go to Nolitusne and ask him why he keeps trying to compete with me.
